2.3.name: wordpress/contactme
2.3.description:
The quickest and easiest way to get a fully customizable contact form on your WordPress blog. Join over 100,000 users who have chosen ContactMe as their contact form of choice!

The most robust FREE Contact Form plugin on Wordpress

Our Contact Form plugin is packed with features that no other wordpress contact form offers. See below for just a few of the features we offer:

  • Add custom contact form fields including text, dropdown menus, radio buttons, checkboxes, date&time pickers and more!
  • Access all of your contact form settings and customizations from right within your Wordpress Admin Panel
  • Include your logo, map, business contact info, even social links right on your contact form
  • Add a CAPTCHA to your contact form to kill spam
  • Setup an autoresponder for your contact form so your visitors get an instant message from you
  • Setup a custom success message or URL for your contact form
  • Get contact fo
